testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to delete a withdrawal record in the system through the API connection.
testcase.name: The deletion of the withdrawal record through the API should be confirmed by sending
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/withdrawal/details/2" path parameters..........passed And The API user records the response from the api withdrawal details endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 203......................passed And The API User verifies that the message information in the response body is "No withdraw.".passed
